DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate role psychosocial factor development hypertension cardiovascular disease .
DOC.detailed_description: DESIGN NARRATIVE : The study several interrelated theme . One explore relationship environmental stress blood pressure range time course , acute laboratory study one extreme , long- term prospective study . The basic model stress include three element : objective nature stressor , individual 's perception , physiological susceptibility . This model incorporated element Karasek Job Strain model Frankenhaueser effort-distress model , two component correspond demand control . A third dimension social support . These model test laboratory field condition . Blood pressure main dependent variable , together structural change heart carotid artery . Five project include . Project l evaluate ability ambulatory blood pressure , blood pressure variability , predict cardiovascular morbidity , also include cross-sectional study compare relationship blood pressure target organ damage Black white individual . The hypothesis white coat hypertension condition associate low risk sustain hypertension also test . Project 2 prospectively evaluated effect job strain social support blood pressure outcome variable work population . Project 3 studied psychosocial hormonal factor influence diurnal variation blood pressure woman , include change associate menstruation menopause . Project 4 assess within-subject change blood pressure subject expose change level occupational stress two month . Project 5 examine conceptual model job strain , social support , white coat hypertension control laboratory condition . The study renew FY 1998 FY 2003 continue follow-up analysis .
